text:
6 Jan 2025

I suffered back injury on my L1, L4 and L5 and was recommended to visit Physio & Sole Clinic (Kembangan) by my Orthopedic.

On my 1st visit, I was attended by Joshua, the physiotherapist, he quickly understood my condition and skillfully administered pressure point massage on my back thereafter taught me some stretching exercise to practice at home to build-up my core muscles.

After 3 consultations, I have regained confidence in my everyday chores and able to move at ease.

I wish to thank him for my speedy recovery and wish to recommend his services to anyone who needs.

Thank you very much.

Best regards,
Jasmine Wong

Joshua is a skilled, professional and affable physio. Was dealing with persistent patellar tendon pain but under his care, I have regained the confidence to return to sport. He is an excellent choice if you are looking for a physiotherapist.
great great service from them. Joshua helped me to recover from a torn meniscus in less than 3 months. Extremely appreciative for his patience and perseverance throughout the whole.recovery process.
Joshua has been a great support in terms of my post surgery rehabilitation. Knowledgeable and friendly. Incorporated some football related exercises for smooth transition back to the sport.

Had a great first experience here. Podiatrist was knowledgeable and taught me ways to alleviate my foot pain. I was scheduled for a followup 2 weeks later.

I enquired before my follow up if there was another charge of 180. Staff told me no charge of 180, but did not specify a follow charge price.

I felt misled to paying another 50 for follow up as the staff told me no charge of 180 and did not elaborate further. I will be not coming back due to lack of clear communication, no fault on the podiatrist.
